alert.note: Alert for Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 03 at 6:24AM EST until December 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Amounts up to 10 inches possible above 1500 ft elevation. * WHERE...In New York, Western Clinton County. In Vermont, Orleans and Essex Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult Sunday evening into Monday morning. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy and wet, especially late Sunday into Monday morning. Scattered power outages are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
